mapper.select: SELECT br.*,bu.username as author, bu.icon as icon, IFNULL(bz.status, FALSE) as status FROM bbs_reply br LEFT JOIN bbs_user bu ON br.user_id = bu.id LEFT JOIN bbs_up bz ON br.id = bz.reply_id AND bz.user_id = #{userId} WHERE br.posts_id = #{postId} ORDER BY br.init_time DESC

SELECT bu.username as author, bu.icon as icon, COUNT(user_id) AS reply_count, br.user_id as user_id FROM bbs_reply br LEFT JOIN bbs_user bu ON bu.id = br.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND br.init_time >= #{beginTime} AND br.init_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY br.user_id ORDER BY reply_count DESC
